# isEqual(to:)

**Instance Method**

Indicates whether the receiver is equal to the specified date interval.

## Declaration

```swift
func isEqual(to dateInterval: DateInterval) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **dateInterval**: The date interval with which to check the receiver for equality.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSDateInterval/startDate] and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSDateInterval/duration] of `dateInterval` and the receiver are equal. Otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Comparing Date Intervals

- **compare(_:)**: Compares the receiver with the specified date interval.
